title: MyGift Set of 3 Modern Clear Ribbed Glass Votive Candle Holders and Decorative Cement Candlescape Tray with Gold Rimmed Base, Includes White Pebble Stone Filler
features: Decorative candlescape set, centerpiece tabletop candle accent display perfect for dining room tables, mantles, or coffee tables
Candle centerpiece includes concrete gray and gold rimmed tray, 3 glass candle holders and white pebble stone fillers
3 vertical ribbed design clear glass candle holders are ideal for flame or flameless tealight, votive or pillar candles **Candles not included**
White pebble stone fillers add elegance to the tray display; Perfect for everyday use or special occasions
Approximate Dimensions: Overall - 3.7 H x 15.0 W x 5.1 D; Tray - 1.6 H x 15.0 W x 5.1 D; Candle Holders - 2.8 H x 3.6 Diameter, Interior - 3.0 Diameter (in inches)
description: Add modern elegance to your tabletop with this sleek design candlescape set. Featuring a cement gray and gold rimmed tray, this candle set includes three small vertical ribbed clear glass candle holders for both flame and flameless tealight, pillar, or votive candles to be held. Small white stone pebbles can be scattered in the base of the tray for added elegance to your centerpieces. Ideal for everyday décor, you can feature this candlescape on any dining room table, coffee table, mantle or bathroom counter for a touch of sophistication and ambiance to any space, or for special occasions such as romantic dinners, anniversaries, or even just for relaxing in the bathtub. Create a romantic and relaxing environment while adding modern design to your home décor with this 4 piece tabletop candlescape centerpiece candle holder set.
Approximate Dimensions: Overall - 3.7 H x 15.0 W x 5.1 D; Tray - 1.6 H x 15.0 W x 5.1 D; Candle Holders - 2.8 H x 3.6 Diameter, Interior - 3.0 Diameter (in inches)
